Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.CharacterCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfluenceCharacterCard, MotherNatureCharacterCard, MovementCharacterCard
public class CharacterCard extends Object
A Class to represent the character cards
